languages.text: Any pet regains {uip|Wounds|6f5225ff33c34371b2b38f352e46fcbd} Wounds if adjacent to wielder on wielder's turn end.

languages.text: If the wearer ends their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with any adjacent familiar, that familiar regains +{uip|Wounds|6f5225ff33c34371b2b38f352e46fcbd} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 如果装备者结束{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}时与任意使仆相邻，则该名使仆恢复{uip|Wounds|6f5225ff33c34371b2b38f352e46fcbd}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Beendet der Träger seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit einem angrenzenden Vertrauten, regeneriert dieser Vertraute +{uip|Wounds|6f5225ff33c34371b2b38f352e46fcbd} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
